last_episode_to_air.name: The Enemy Within
last_episode_to_air.overview: Whilst investigating the disappearance of a local journalist, Max and Miranda uncover a high-profile assassination plot at an upcoming summit being held on the island. After a devastating event leaves a guilty Max & Miranda sidelined and at odds with one another, the duo will need to put their differences aside in order to save the day.

name: The Mallorca Files
overview: Amongst the vibrant international community of the eponymous Spanish island, a British and a German detective with very different approaches to policing have a clash of personalities. Despite - or perhaps because of - their very different approaches, the sleuths form a perfect complementary partnership as they seek to solve a new crime on the island each week.

seasons.name: Series 1
seasons.overview: A British police officer joins forces with a German detective to fight crime on Mallorca.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In Season 3, our dynamic detective duo are thrust into a series of high-stakes adventures across the island of Mallorca, Spain. Amid treasure hunts, arson, kidnappings, murders, and new relationship drama, Max and Miranda's personal tensions come to a head and test their odd-couple partnership.

episodes.name: Honour Amongst Thieves
episodes.overview: British police officer DC Miranda Blake is reluctantly paired with wise-cracking German detective Max Winter to investigate a criminal gang based in Mallorca.

episodes.name: King of the Mountains
episodes.overview: When top Mallorcan cyclist Esteban Domenech disappears during a routine training session, Miranda and Max take advantage of Ines's absence to investigate.

episodes.name: The Oligarch's Icon
episodes.overview: When the famous icon of St Nicholas is stolen by a masked assailant in front of a shocked crowd, Miranda and Max enter the world of Russian oligarchs.

episodes.name: Number One Fan
episodes.overview: When a supermodel goes missing, Max and Miranda sashay into the world of fashion and design to try to discover how someone can vanish from a moving train.

episodes.name: Sour Grapes
episodes.overview: Miranda and Max head out into wine country to investigate the killing of a dog at one of Mallorca's most famous vineyards. It transpires that the shooting is just one of an increasingly dramatic series of threats faced by property owner Hans Webber.

episodes.name: To Kill a Stag
episodes.overview: When a groom-to-be is found dead in the swimming pool of a luxury villa, Miranda and Max believe it's the work of a prostitute who stuns her clients and then robs them.

episodes.name: Friend Henry
episodes.overview: Miranda and Max investigate the death of a world-famous DJ after he plays at Mallorca's most popular nightclub, leading the detectives to investigate a sophisticated drug network.

episodes.name: Death in the Morning
episodes.overview: The brutal murder of a famous British author and anti-bullfighting campaigner brings Max and Miranda to Cazador in the wild interior of Mallorca.

episodes.name: Mallorca's Most Wanted
episodes.overview: An apprehended drug dealer tips off Miranda and Max that a fugitive on Mallorca's most wanted list is back on the island to visit his dying father.

episodes.name: Ex Factor
episodes.overview: As Max and Miranda investigate some thefts at the home of a legendary music producer turned reality TV star, the pair find themselves the stars of a deadly show.

1.name: Series 1
1.overview: A British police officer joins forces with a German detective to fight crime on Mallorca.

episodes.name: The Maestro
episodes.overview: The team investigate the death of Jose Canasta, an opera singer who turns out to be an abusive man.

episodes.name: Son of a Pig
episodes.overview: While investigating a missing persons case, Max and Miranda learn of a series of historical murders that link a mass grave, an unknown body and a washed-up private detective.

episodes.name: A Dish Served Cold
episodes.overview: Max and Miranda embark on a culinary journey through gastronomic Mallorca to uncover the murderer of the famous food critic Oliver Barker.

episodes.name: The Beautiful Game
episodes.overview: While protecting a famous Real Mallorca footballer from death threats, Max and Miranda uncover dodgy deals and illicit love affairs in the world of top-flight football.

episodes.name: The Blue Feather
episodes.overview: Max and Miranda are sent to a remote part of the island to search for a missing diabetic British birdwatcher. What they end up finding is an international smuggling ring.

episodes.name: The Outlaw Jose Rey
episodes.overview: Max and Miranda go on a wild west adventure to the horse riding world of Rancho del Ray to investigate a credit card scam, only to discover a tragic history that leads to murder.

episodes.name: All That Glisters
episodes.overview: When the inventor of an island-wide treasure hunt is kidnapped, it’s a race against time for Max and Miranda to solve the puzzle first in order to save his life. Can Max and Miranda work together to find all the clues, or will their personal lives get in the way?

episodes.name: Clandestino
episodes.overview: When a member of Mallorcan aristocracy is killed at a high-profile charity function, all suspicions fall on the "manteros" - the immigrant street-peddlers selling items all over the city. Is this a true case of class warfare or of the wrongfully accused?

episodes.name: The Spanish Prisoner
episodes.overview: Max and Miranda go undercover as a married couple, living the life of luxury, to try and capture one of Europe's most prolific conmen. Can they stop him or will their attempt at "married" life get in the way?

episodes.name: Water Water
episodes.overview: Max and Miranda investigate an arson case in the Mallorcan countryside that has become the unlikely center of a volatile election. When a body is discovered, our detectives must sort through the murky dealings of politicians, businessmen, and eco-activists to solve what lies at the heart of the crime.

episodes.name: The Great Escape
episodes.overview: When a criminal makes an audacious escape from prison, Max and Miranda are forced to team up with a mainland cop from Barcelona in order to find him before a vengeful gangster does first. Can the team track down the fugitive in time, or will their new third wheel thwart the investigation?

episodes.name: A Girls Best Friend
episodes.overview: Miranda and Max are punished for a longstanding smuggling bust going south by being sent undercover in a holiday resort to investigate a series of thefts from guests’ rooms. While Max is happy for the getaway, Miranda is offended by assignment. Can they survive the job long enough to discover the bigger mystery right under their noses?

episodes.name: Madre
episodes.overview: Miranda is forced to finally take some time off, but when a body appears near a mysterious women-only island retreat, Miranda can't help but meddle in Max's investigation by checking into the resort herself. Miranda’s investigations take her close to the truth, but has she put herself in mortal danger?

episodes.name: The Enemy Within
episodes.overview: Whilst investigating the disappearance of a local journalist, Max and Miranda uncover a high-profile assassination plot at an upcoming summit being held on the island. After a devastating event leaves a guilty Max & Miranda sidelined and at odds with one another, the duo will need to put their differences aside in order to save the day.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In Season 3, our dynamic detective duo are thrust into a series of high-stakes adventures across the island of Mallorca, Spain. Amid treasure hunts, arson, kidnappings, murders, and new relationship drama, Max and Miranda's personal tensions come to a head and test their odd-couple partnership.
